select
from AC_GOODSINFO where AppId = #{AppId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND status = 1 AND startTime>=#{startTime,jdbcType=TIME} OR terminalTime>#{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}

select
from AC_GOODSINFO where QuId = #{QuId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND status = 1 AND startTime >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}
mapper.update: UPDATE AC_GOODSINFO SET userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AppId = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, QuId = #{quId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gName = #{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gprice = #{gprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gphotourl1 = #{gphotourl1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl2 = #{gphotourl2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl3 = #{gphotourl3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl4 = #{gphotourl4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl5 = #{gphotourl5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl6 = #{gphotourl6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl7 = #{gphotourl7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl8 = #{gphotourl8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl9 = #{gphotourl9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gphotourl10 = #{gphotourl10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, startTime =#{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, terminalTime =#{terminalTime,jdbcType=TIME} WHERE gId = #{gId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
